thread.title: Kotobukiya Showcases DC, Marvel, And Star Wars Lineup
thread.title_full: Kotobukiya Showcases DC, Marvel, And Star Wars Lineup

author: Matthew Mueller
title: Kotobukiya Showcases DC, Marvel, And Star Wars Lineup
text:
Kotobukiya Showcases DC, Marvel, And Star Wars Lineup Matthew Mueller Start Slideshow Slide of 
Amid the flurry of announcements from Toy Fair 2017, it was easy to lose count of all the collectibles that demand to be a part of your collection. This goes especially for renowned statue maker Kotobukiya , who instead of unleashing everything all at once peppered small announcements throughout the entire weekend. 
Now that everything is all wrapped up Kotobukiya has released their updated catalog, and it has a bit of something for everyone. ArtFX and ArtFX+ fans will have plenty to look forward to with new Marvel selections including The Punisher, Star-Lord, and Spider-Man 2099. Marvel will also be getting a new Ms. Marvel Bishoujo, as will DC courtesy of Katana.
